text: Jelena Janković successfully defended her title, beating qualifier Alizé Cornet in the final, 6–2, 6–2. ==Seeds== The top eight seeds receive a bye into the second round. ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top Half=== ====Section 1==== ====Section 2==== ===Bottom Half=== ====Section 3==== ====Section 4==== ==Qualifying== ===Seeds=== ===Qualifiers=== ===Lucky Losers=== ===Qualifying Draw=== ====First qualifier==== ====Second qualifier==== ====Third qualifier==== ====Fourth qualifier==== ====Fifth qualifier==== ====Sixth qualifier==== ====Seventh qualifier==== ====Eighth qualifier==== ====Ninth qualifier==== ====Tenth qualifier==== ====Eleventh qualifier==== ====Twelfth qualifier==== ==References== ==External links== * Official results archive (ITF) * Official results archive (WTA) Women's Singles Italian Open – Singles
title: 2008 Italian Open – Women's Singles
